articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Kangdong Precision Machine Plant
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Kangdong Precision Machine Plant
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the Kangdong Precision Machine Plant.
					 He said that he came to the plant to encourage its workers in their new year drive they launched full of confidence in victory after unfailingly carrying out their production quota assigned by the party last year.
					
					 He went round the remodeled revolutionary museum.
					
					 When visiting it in July of 2013, he recalled that the plant was associated with a lot of revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il as the President personally chose its site and guided its construction and Kim Jong Il paid special attention to it till the last moments of his life. Kim Jong Un called on the plant to remodel the room for education in the revolutionary history into the revolutionary museum so as to convey their undying leadership feats to posterity.
					
					 He looked round the monument to the revolutionary activities of peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu newly erected in the compound of the plant.
					
					 He said that the monument was built well and it was the fruition of the noble ideological and mental world of the officials and employees of the plant who are determined to live and work, always thinking of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. He praised its workers for having always remained loyal to the party with signal production achievements.
					
					 He went round different places of the plant to learn in detail about development of new products and production there.
					
					 Watching machines newly produced at the plant, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that its workers successfully developed efficient machines by devoting their creative wisdom and enthusiasm.
					
					 The plant has a very important duty to perform for developing the country's machine-building industry, he noted, setting forth the tasks to be fulfilled by the plant.
					
					 An important task before the plant is to wage a dynamic drive to overfulfill its national economy plan for this year and, at the same time, simultaneously push ahead with the project to expand its production capacity, he stressed.
					
					 He said that it is necessary to have in place not only modern machine-processing equipment but also testing and measuring equipment based on the cutting edge technology in order to meet the growing needs for precision machines and raise the quality of products.
					
					 He instructed the plant to build welfare and service facilities to be impeccable while updating it and construct a scientific and technological disseminating room as required by the age of knowledge-based economy to thoroughly implement the party's policy for educating all the people to be well versed in science and technology.
					
					 Going round bedrooms, a dining hall and reading room of the workers' hostel newly built at the plant, he said that it should meticulously manage and operate the hostel to provide the hostellers with best conditions so that they might not feel any inconveniences in their living.
					
					 The supply service is the important policy issue consistently emphasized by the party and if the supply service is proven successful and the level of cultural and emotional life is high, the employees' attachment for the plant and their enthusiasm for production will naturally grow strong, he noted, urging the officials to always use their brains and make strenuous efforts to provide the employees with better conditions for production and living. 
					
					 He expressed belief and conviction that the officials and workers of the plant would continue to add shine to the honor of being a model plant in devotedly implementing the party's policy by fully displaying the revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu and the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu.
					
					 Then he had a photo session with them.
					
					 He was accompanied by Han Kwang Sang, department director of the C.C., the WPK, Ri Pyong Chol, first vice department director of the C.C., the WPK, and Kim Yo Jong and Hong Yong Chil, vice department directors of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: DPRK Will Honor Its Commitments to Anti-Money Laundering
articles.content:
DPRK Will Honor Its Commitments to Anti-Money Laundering
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the National Coordinating Committee of the DPRK on Anti-Money Laundering and Combating the Financing of Terrorism Friday gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA in connection with the fact that, recently, the DPRK committed itself to implementing the action plan of "international standard" for anti-money laundering and combating the financing of terrorism:
					 On Jan. 15, the president of the Central  Bank of the DPRK submitted the Financial Action Task Force on Anti-Money Laundering a letter in which the DPRK committed itself to implementing the action plan of "international standard" for anti-money laundering and combating the financing of terrorism.
					
					 This is a manifestation of the political will of the DPRK government, prompted by its consistent stand to boost international cooperation for anti-money laundering and combating the financing of terrorism.
					
					 Most of the recommendations in the action plan have long been implemented by the DPRK to suit its specific conditions as they are legal and institutional measures for incriminating and punishing money launderers and supporters of the financing of terrorism.
					
					 The DPRK will sincerely implement the action plan to promote the mutual understanding among the member nations of the Financial Action Task Force as it had committed despite the moves of the U.S. and some other countries which are not pleased with cooperation between the DPRK and the Financial Action Task Force.
					
					 The Task Force should positively respond to such cooperation efforts made by the DPRK just as it gave assurances at the negotiations with the latter.

articles.title: Iranian FM Opposes Outsiders' Interference in Korean Peninsula Issue
articles.content:
Iranian FM Opposes Outsiders' Interference in Korean Peninsula Issue
 Tehran, January 15 (KCNA) -- Iranian Foreign Minister Mohammad Javad Zarif met the DPRK ambassador to his country on Jan. 12 at which he said that Iran was standing against foreign forces' interference in the issues of the north and the south of Korea.
					 He welcomed the proposal for inter-Korean dialogue made by supreme leader of the DPRK Kim Jong Un in his New Year address.
					
					 The Korean peninsula issue should be settled through dialogue in a peaceful way, neither by use of armed forces nor by military options, he stressed.

articles.title: Art Performance Given on Founding Anniversary of Youth League
articles.content:
Art Performance Given on Founding Anniversary of Youth League
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- The art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League gave an art performance on Friday to celebrate the 69th founding anniversary of the youth league. 
					 The performance began with narration and mixed chorus "Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League's Song" and "March of Korean Youth".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the undying exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed by consistently pursuing the politics of attaching importance to and loving young people and setting a fine example in settling the issue of young people in the whole course of their revolutionary leadership.
					
					 Among the audience were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of the youth league, students and young people.

articles.title: Lots of Foreigners Visit Room for Education in Revolutionary History
articles.content:
Lots of Foreigners Visit Room for Education in Revolutionary History
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- Youth delegations and delegates from Nigeria, Russia, Laos, DR Congo, Brazil and Syria and other countries and regions and overseas Korean youth visited the room for the education in the revolutionary history of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League.
					 Displayed in the room are President Kim Il Sung's works which defined the youth as powerful main force of the revolutionary struggle unlike the preceding theory of the motive power of the revolution and clearly indicated the position, role and general aim of the youth movement and ways for achieving the aim, and data on his revolutionary activities.
					
					 On display there are data dealing with the immortal exploits of leader Kim Jong Il who brought up the youth to be dependable successors of the revolution, vanguard and shock brigade and ushered in a great heyday of the Korean youth movement.
					
					 Also on show are data showing the Korean youth performing miracles and merits in the annals of the revolution by fully demonstrating their wisdom and courage.
					
					 Newly added were photos of supreme leader Kim Jong Un who is opening the history of warm love for the new generation by successfully carrying forward the idea and politics of attaching importance to the youth set forth by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, and revolutionary relics and data.

articles.title: Leadership Exploits of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il for Youth League Praised
articles.content:
Leadership Exploits of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il for Youth League Praised
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- January 17 is the 69th founding anniversary of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League. 
					 On the anniversary all the young people of the DPRK recall with deep emotion the immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who gave birth to the Juche-oriented youth movement and founded the mass youth organization and developed the youth league into the reliable political reserves of the party. 
					
					 Kim Il Sung went among the young people in his early years and started his revolutionary activities by rallying the ranks of fighters. He created the unique idea of prioritizing youth and successfully implemented it during the whole period of leading the revolution. 
					
					 He provided a precious tradition of the youth movement in the flames of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle. Right after the liberation of Korea he worked heart and soul to rally young people under the flag of democracy. 
					
					 After laying a strong foundation of the mass youth organization, he founded the Democratic Youth League of Korea on January 17, Juche 35 (1946) and indicated bright ways for the youth league. 
					
					 In May 1964 at the Fifth Congress of the Democratic Youth League of Korea he declared the renaming the organization the League of Socialist Working Youth of Korea and devoted his tireless efforts to the work for developing the youth league into the powerful combat unit of the Korean revolution and reliable heir to the socialist cause. 
					
					 Thanks to Kim Jong Il's outstanding leadership and particular care, the youth league had developed into the most vibrant unit of society. 
					
					 He handed over the torch of the revolution to the youth and saw to it that the Youth Day was instituted and the League of Socialist Working Youth of Korea was renamed the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, and personally awarded the flag of the youth league bearing the image of the President. 
					
					 He entrusted the task for important construction projects to the youth league and took deep care of it so that it might perform miracles and feats. He took such benevolent step of making sure that monumental edifices built by the young people had letters "youth" in their names. 
					
					 Now the Korean youth movement has greeted a new heyday of its development under the wise leadership of the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK Players Rank First, Second in World's Wrestling Standings
articles.content:
DPRK Players Rank First, Second in World's Wrestling Standings
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- DPRK's Jong Hak Jin and Yang Kyong Il finished the 2013-2014 season rank first and second respectively in the world men's 57 kg free-style wrestling.
					 The standings were decided by the United World Wrestling.
					
					 It is the first time for wrestlers of a country to rank world's first and second in the same category.
					
					 Jong Hak Jin from the April 25 Sports Team proved successful at the International Senior FS Wrestling Tournament "Takhti Cup" held in February and the 17th Asian Games in September last year.
					
					 Yang Kyong Il from the Ryongnamsan Sports Team snatched a gold medal in the 2014 World Wrestling Championship by defeating Iranian rival, a world champion and Georgian opponent, an Olympic silver medalist.
					
					 As a 2009 world wrestling champion, he was selected as one of the nation's best players of the years of 2009, 2011 and 2012.

articles.title: Mushroom, Greenhouse-vegetable Production Grows in DPRK
articles.content:
Mushroom, Greenhouse-vegetable Production Grows in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- A brisk drive for increased production of mushroom and greenhouse vegetables is now going on in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Production gains momentum on mushroom farms across the country.
					
					 In particular, production upswing has been made on Jongbangsan and Haeju mushroom farms, which began to mass-produce various species of mushrooms in close cooperation with relevant institutes.
					
					 Similar successes were also witnessed on mushroom farms in Nampho, Wonsan, Phyongsong and Hamhung cities.
					
					 Meanwhile, many vegetable co-op farms in the country direct big efforts to operating their vegetable greenhouses at full capacity.
					
					 Hwang Jong Ok, a sub-workteam head of the Chongsan Cooperative Farm in Kangso District, Nampho City, told KCNA:
					
					 At least 70 tons of vegetables were harvested in four greenhouses only last year.
					
					 Lots of the farm's families greatly benefit from mushroom farming. My family alone gathered more than one ton of mushroom last year.
					
					 This year, too, my family will make bigger effort to mushroom farming. 
					
					 All peasants of the farm have turned out in a drive for increased production of mushroom and greenhouse vegetables in hearty response to supreme leader Kim Jong Un's New Year address that calls for an upturn in improving the people's living standard.

articles.title: North-targeted War Drills Are Factor of Escalating Distrust: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
North-targeted War Drills Are Factor of Escalating Distrust: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the spokesman for the Ministry of Defence of south Korea termed the DPRK's call for the stop to all war moves "illogic", asserting that military exercises in south Korea would go on for "defense" as long as its alliance with the U.S. exists.
					 Rodong Sinmun on Friday says in an article in this regard:
					
					 The south Korean authorities have already revealed their attempt to persistently launch the north-targeted war drills such as Key Resolve, Foal Eagle and Ulji Freedom Guardian in league with foreign forces this year, too.
					
					 The war drills in south Korea are the main factor of disturbing peace on the Korean peninsula and escalating distrust and confrontation between the north and the south, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The persistent war drills with animosity against the fellow countrymen in the north are reckless acts of going against detente and the improved inter-Korean relations. 
					
					 If the south Korean authorities continue dancing to the tune of the U.S. dreaming of igniting a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula to meet its interests for aggression, in disregard of the fate of the Korean nation, it will bring damage only to the Korean nation. 
					
					 If all war moves including north-targeted war drills end in south Korea, the source of distrust and confrontation between the north and the south will be removed and an important breakthrough for improving the relations be made. As a result, great advance will be made in the struggle of Koreans for the great national unity, peace and reunification.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities truly want dialogue between the north and the south and the improved inter-Korean relations, they should show their sincerity by practical act of totally discontinuing north-targeted war drills, to begin with.

articles.title: Minju Joson Blasts S. Korean Military's War Drills
articles.content:
Minju Joson Blasts S. Korean Military's War Drills
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- In recent days, the south Korean military has gone more reckless in war drills.
					 The Army let the 3rd and 6th Corps and other units stage war drills, claiming that they have greeted the new year with "gun report and battle cry." The Navy also staged a war drill with warships involved. The Air Force is also keen on reckless war frenzy.
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Friday says:
					
					 The whole Korean nation is turning out in the struggle to join efforts to open up a broad avenue to independent reunification but the south Korean military is spoiling such an atmosphere through the above-said war drills. These are dangerous acts which can be made only by the traitors, who do not desire the reconciliation and unity with the north but pursue confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 It is none other than the south Korean military which tried desperately to stand against the trend of the times by staging the north-targeted war drills in conspiracy with the U.S. even in the June 15 era of reunification when the reconciliation and unity between the north and the south were promoted to win the admiration of the world.
					
					 What merits a more serious attention is the fact that the south Korean chief executive, too, has been conniving at such war drills. It is clear that if she can not put the military under her control, it is impossible to expect dialogue and contact between the north and the south, and the horrible danger of a nuclear war will increase.
					
					 The south Korean authorities had better give a clear answer to whether they want dialogue or war drills.
					
					 All the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad are following the attitude of the south Korean authorities.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Invoking "Security Law"
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Invoking "Security Law"
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore in an editorial on Jan. 14 denounced the authorities for invoking the fascist "Security Law" again.
					 A Korean professor in the U.S. was expelled from south Korea for the mere reason that she talked about her impressions of the north, and a former deputy spokesperson for the Democratic Labor Party was detained, the editorial recalled.
					
					 There remains the likelihood that the present chief executive may continue using this evil law as a means for cracking down on political opponents and creating a terrible atmosphere in society like that under the past dictatorial regime, it noted.
					
					 The chief executive seems not to understand at all that free expression of facts and opinions are the minimum element for democratization, it held.
					
					 The "Security Law" is going rampant though it should be abolished, it said, adding: This reality means a retreat of democracy and shame on society.

articles.title: Crackdown upon Progressive Activists Slammed
articles.content:
Crackdown upon Progressive Activists Slammed
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- Organizations in south Korea including the Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy and the Christian Joint Measure Committee issued a joint statement on Jan. 14 denouncing the authorities for cracking down upon progressive activists, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Jaju Minbo.
					 The statement accused the regime of expelling a Korean professor in the U.S. and finally arresting Hwang Son, representative of the Forum for the Study of Politics Desired.
					
					 The present regime is mistaken if it calculates it can tide over its ruling crisis through the suppression of the pro-reunification progressive forces, the statement said, adding: The struggle to foil the regime's suppression under the pretence of security will kick off like a storm before long.
					
					 The statement demanded the present regime set free at once Hwang Son, who was arrested under the pretext of "following the north."

articles.title: Bird Flu Spreads in South Korea
articles.content:
Bird Flu Spreads in South Korea
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- Bird flu occurred in Ryoju, Kyonggi Province, according to south Korean KBS.
					 The examination of chickens from January 12 to 14 confirmed that they were infected with bird flu.
					
					 It was reported by south Korean CBS that bird flu broke out on a farm of Kangso District, Pusan City on Jan. 12, leaving chickens and wild geese dead en masse.
					
					 Meanwhile, bird flu virus was discovered from migratory birds caught in Cheonan, South Chungchong Province on Jan. 11.

articles.title: South Koreans Protest U.S. Sanctions against DPRK
articles.content:
South Koreans Condemn U.S. Sanctions against DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- Members of public organizations in south Korea including the Bar Association for Democratic Society and students held a meeting in Seoul on Jan. 13 to protest against the U.S. sanctions against the DPRK. 
					 They accused the U.S. of imposing sanctions on the DPRK under the pretext of cyber attack on the Sony Pictures Entertainment at a time when an atmosphere for improving south-north relations was created.
					
					 This laid a hurdle in the way of developing the south-north relations, they said, condemning the sanctions as a sinister political attempt to bedevil the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 They demanded the U.S. lift the sanctions and the pressure upon the north.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Urged to Lift "May 24 Steps"
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Urged to Lift "May 24 Step"
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- Actions demanding the lifting of the "May 24 step" are gaining in scope and strength in south Korea, according to the south Korean internet paper Thongil News.
					 The Headquarters of the Movement for Reunified Korean Nation published a declaration in Seoul on Jan. 7 demanding the lifting of the "May 24 step".
					
					 The present chief executive is talking about "unification" but this is impossible if the "May 24 step" is not lifted, the declaration said.
					
					 To lift the step is an immediate task for improving the south-north relations, it noted.
					
					 Organizations for south-north economic cooperation and civic, religious and public organizations held a press conference at the Kwanghwamun plaza in Seoul on Jan. 13 at which they demanded the lifting of the "May 24 step". They said that if the chief executive truly wants unification, she should show her will in practice. 
					
					 They declared that they would stage actions demanding the lifting of "May 24 step" and resumption of tour of Mt. Kumgang, etc.

articles.title: S. Korean Court Sentences Teacher to Prison Term
articles.content:
S. Korean Court Sentences Teacher to Prison Term
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- The Jonju District Court of south Korea on Jan. 13 sentenced Kim Hyong Gun, former teacher belonging to the Teachers Union, to a prison term.
					 It charged him with the violation of the "Security Law", saying he kept, posted and disseminated "copies of literature benefiting the enemy".

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Studied Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Studied Abroad
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- Seminars, reading sessions and round-table talks took place in Romania, Guinea and Ethiopia from Jan. 8 to 10 to study Marshal Kim Jong Un's New Year address.
					 Personages of the Romanian Workers' Association said Kim Jong Un set forth the most reasonable ways of reunifying Korea despite the vicious moves of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad.
					
					 They affirmed that the Korean people would join efforts to open up a broad avenue to independent reunification thanks to his wise guidance.
					
					 An official of a company of Guinea quoted Kim Jong Un as saying in his New Year address that no force on earth can check the advance of the army and people of the DPRK who are rushing forward like the blizzards of Paektu under the leadership of the great Workers' Party of Korea, and final victory undoubtedly belongs to Korea.
					
					 Personages of a water project construction station of Ethiopia noted the New Year address helped them know well about the loving care of Kim Jong Un to provide the people with a happier life, adding they keenly felt the fixed will of the great man to settle the issue of Korea's reunification by the Korean nation itself, free from outsiders' interference.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Pakistani Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Pakistani Figure
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- The January issue of a Pakistani magazine carried an article titled "Anti-imperialism, Songun politics and Kim Jong Il" authored by the general director of a research institute of Pakistan.
					 The article said leader Kim Jong Il authored works to give lucid answers to the principled matters arising in the party work and to strategic issues for the struggle for global independence against imperialism, thus foiling the imperialists' vicious moves to stifle the DPRK and winning a shining victory in the drive for defending socialism.
					
					 The article said thanks to his Songun politics, the DPRK won victory after victory in the stand-off with the U.S. and established diplomatic ties with those countries that had been hostile toward it. The article added that the DPRK has demonstrated its dignity as a military power that had access to a powerful nuclear deterrence despite the imperialist allied forces' moves to stifle it.
					
					 Saying that in order to reunify Korea he provided the north-south summits and opened up a wide avenue to national reconciliation and cooperation, the article stressed that all these achievements are a fruition of his wise guidance.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- The Bangladeshi preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il was formed on Jan. 10.
					 Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize meetings, seminars, film shows and other political and cultural events for praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il at political parties, social bodies and friendship and solidarity organizations and groups for the study of the Juche idea in Bangladesh.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Foreign Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Foreign Personages
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- Personages of Egypt and Mongolia expressed support for the New Year address made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					 The chairman of the Trade Union of Workers in Agriculture and Irrigation of Egypt in a statement on Jan. 13 quoted Kim Jong Un in his New Year address as saying that however complicated the situation may be and whatever obstacles and difficulties may stand in the way, the Korean people should achieve national reunification, the greatest desire of the nation, and build a dignified and prosperous reunified power without fail.
					
					 The Trade Union of Workers in Agriculture and Irrigation of Egypt is convinced that the Korean people will register bigger successes in 2015 under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), he noted.
					
					 The secretary of the Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party in a talk with an official of the DPRK embassy on Jan. 7 said that the proposal for reunifying the country advanced by Kim Jong Un in his New Year address is the most just one in line with the reality of the DPRK.
					
					 He fully supported the WPK's stand on national reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige en terreno Fabrica de Maquinas de Precision de Kangdong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige en terreno Fabrica de Maquinas de Precision de Kangdong
Pyongyang, 16 de enero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Fabrica de Maquinas de Precision de Kangdong.
					El Mariscal dijo que la visito para estimular a los obreros quienes cumplieron todas las tareas de produccion dadas por el partido e iniciaron sus trabajos de nuevo ano con la fe en la victoria.
					
					El Mariscal recorrio el museo de la historia revolucionaria nuevamente construido.
					
					Al visitarla en julio de 2013, el Mariscal dijo que en esta fabrica estan impregnadas muchas historias revolucionarias de los generalisimos porque el Presidente Kim Il Sung hizo construirla al escoger personalmente su solar y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il presto atencion especial hasta el ultimo latido de su corazon. E instruyo transmitir de generacion en generacion las imperecederas hazanas de direccion de los generalisimos al remodelar la sala de educacion en las historias revolucionarias como museo de historia revolucionaria.
					
					El Mariscal paso revista al monumento a las actividades revolucionaria de los grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu erguido nuevamente en el recinto de la fabrica.
					
					Subrayo que la construyo con excelencia y  agrego que eso es el fruto del noble mundo ideo-espiritual de los funcionarios y empleados de la fabrica de vivir y luchar pensando solo en el Presidente y el Dirigente. Y evaluo que son distinguibles los obreros de la fabrica quienes han venido apoyando fielmente al partido siempre con elevados resultados de produccion.
					
					Recorriendo varios puntos de la fabrica, el Mariscal se cercioro en detalles del estado de desarrollo de nuevos productos y su produccion.
					
					Presenciando la maquina nuevamente producida en la fabrica, expreso su gran satisfaccion de que la clase obrera de la fabrica haya desarrollado excelentemente la maquina de alto funcionamiento dedicando toda su inteligencia creativa y pasion.
					
					Acotando que es muy importante el deber de la fabrica en desarrollar la industria de construccion de maquinaria del pais, presento las tareas que se incumben a la fabrica.
					
					La importante tarea que se presenta ante la fabrica es esforzarse por sobrecumplir el plan de la economia nacional para este ano, por una parte y por la otra, impulsar simultaneamente la labor para ampliar la capacidad productiva, asevero.
					
					Para satisfacer la creciente demanda de las maquinas de precision y elevar la calidad de los productos es necesario equiparse con las modernas instalaciones de elaboracion de maquinas y al mismo tiempo otras de examen y  medicion dotadas por las tecnologias de punta, ratifico.
					
					Instruyo acondicionar perfectamente las instalaciones de servicio publico realizando la modernizacion de la fabrica y construir la sala de divulgacion de conocimientos cientifico-tecnicos segun la demanda de la epoca de economia intelectual para contribuir a materializar cabalmente la orientacion del partido de formar a todos los ciudadanos como  excelentes cientificos y tecnicos.
					
					Visitando las habitaciones, el comedor y la sala de lectura de la residencia de los trabajadores nuevamente construida en la fabrica, el Mariscal ordeno organizar con escrupulosidad la administracion de residencia para que los internos no sientan ninguna incomodidad en su vida y asegurarles al maximo la comodidad.
					
					El problema de abastecimiento es una cuestion politica importante en que hace enfasis el partido en todo momento, destaco y continuo que se elevaran naturalmente el apego a la fabrica y el afan de produccion de los empleados cuando se mejoren los niveles de abastecimiento y de vida cultural.
					
					Anadio que los funcionarios deben pensar siempre y esforzarse mucho por facilitar a los empleados mejores condiciones de produccion y vida.
					
					Tomo una foto de recuerdo con los funcionarios y los obreros de la fabrica manifestando la esperanza y conviccion de que ellos mantendran el honor de fabrica ejemplar en la materializacion consecuente de la politica del partido haciendo uso del espiritu revolucionario del Paektu, el espiritu de viento cortante del Paektu.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Han Kwang Sang, jefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Ri Pyong Chol, primer subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Yo Jong y Hong Yong Chil, subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC.

articles.title: RPDC cumplira con sinceridad plan de accion del "Estandar Internacional"
articles.content:
RPDC cumplira con sinceridad plan de accion del "Estandar Internacional"
Pyongyang, 16 de enero (ACNC) -- A la pregunta formulada el dia 16 por la ACNC en relacion con que recientemente, la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea se comprometio a implementar el Plan de Accion del "Estandar Internacional" contra el lavado de dinero y la financiacion del terrorismo, el portavoz del Comite de Coordinacion Nacional de la RPDC sobre el Anti-lavado de Dinero y Anti-Financiacion del Terrorismo dio la siguiente respuesta:
					El pasado dia 15, el presidente del Banco Central de nuestro pais presento a la Fuerza Encargada de Accion Financiera contra el Lavado de Dinero una carta prometiendo la ejecucion del Plan de Accion segun el "Estandar Internacional" contra el lavado de dinero y la financiacion del terrorismo.
					
					Esto es una manifestacion de la voluntad politica del gobierno de la RPDC que parte de su invariable posicion de estrechar la cooperacion internacional contra el lavado de dinero y la financiacion del terrorismo.
					
					Los articulos de ejecucion recomendada del Plan de Accion son las medidas legales e institucionales para criminalizar y castigar el lavado de dinero y la financiacion del terrorismo que en su mayoria, se ponen en practica desde hace mucho tiempo conforme a las condiciones reales de nuestro pais.
					
					A pesar de las acciones obstaculizadoras de EE.UU. y algunos paises que estan descontentos de la cooperacion entre nuestro pais y la organizacion arriba referida, cumpliremos con sinceridad el Plan de Accion como ha prometido a la organizacion para fomentar el entendimiento mutuo entre los paises miembros.
					
					La organizacion debe responder positivamente a nuestros esfuerzos cooperativos como ha asegurado en las negociaciones con nuestro pais.

articles.title: Canciller irani rechaza intervencion de fuerzas extranjeras en asuntos de Peninsula Coreana
articles.content:
Canciller irani rechaza intervencion de fuerzas extranjeras en asuntos de Peninsula Coreana
Teheran, 15 de enero (ACNC) -- En la audiencia dada el dia 12 al embajador de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea acreditada en su pais, el canciller irani Mohammad Javad Zarif dijo que Iran rechaza la injerencia de las fuerzas extranjeras en los asuntos existentes entre ambas partes coreanas.
					Prosiguio que respalda la propuesta del Dirigente de la RPDC, Kim Jong Un, de realizar el dialogo intercoreano pronunciada en su mensaje del ano nuevo.
					
					Apunto que el problema de la Peninsula Coreana debe ser solucionado no con el empleo de las fuerzas armadas o la opcion militar sino de manera pacifica mediante el dialogo.

articles.title: Ejercicios militares agudizan desconfianza y antagonismo entre N-S, apunta Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Ejercicios militares agudizan desconfianza y antagonismo entre N-S, apunta Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 16 de enero (ACNC) -- Hace poco, el vocero del Ministerio de Defensa Nacional del Sur de Corea dijo que continuaran los ejercicios mientras exista el sistema combinado con Estados Unidos e insistio en que sus ejercicios son los "defensivos" y es ilogico el llamamiento de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea a cesar todas las maniobras belicas.
					Sus disparates prueban el intento de las autoridades del Sur de Corea de desarrollar de continuo junto con las fuerzas extranjeras los ejercicios de guerra de agresion a la RPDC, entre otros "Key Resolve", "Foal Eagle" y "Ulji Freedom Guardian".
					
					Asi inicia el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo divulgado el dia 16 y prosigue:
					
					Los alborotos militares en el territorio del Sur de Corea son el factor principal que destruye la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y agudiza la desconfianza y el antagonismo entre ambas partes coreanas.
					
					Aferrarse seguidamente a los ejercicios militares sin liberarse de la hostilidad a los connacionales es un acto negativo al alivio de la tension y a la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					Solo sufrira el dano la nacion coreana si el Sur de Corea sigue bailando al son que le toca EE.UU. que trata de provocar la guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana para sacar su provecho sin tomar en consideracion el destino de la nacion.
					
					Si paran en el Sur de Corea todas las maniobras belicas, se eliminara el factor principal de la desconfianza y el antagonismo entre ambas partes coreanas y se abrira la brecha en la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas, asi que se lograra considerable avance en la lucha por la gran union, la gran unidad, la paz y la reunificacion de la nacion coreana.
					
					Si las autoridades del Sur de Corea desean de veras el dialogo y la mejora de las relaciones N-S, deben demostrar su sinceridad a traves de las acciones practicas, o sea, cesar ante todo los ejercicios de guerra de agresion a la RPDC.
